description: Commands to manage a Site Recovery Manager (SRM) addon.

commands.name: az vmware addon srm create
commands.summary: Create a Site Recovery Manager (SRM) addon for a private cloud.
commands.syntax:
az vmware addon srm create --private-cloud
                           --resource-group
                           [--license-key]
                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az vmware addon srm create --resource-group MyResourceGroup --private-cloud MyPrivateCloud --license-key "41915-178A8-FF4A4-DB683-6D735"

commands.name: az vmware addon srm delete
commands.summary: Delete a Site Recovery Manager (SRM) addon for a private cloud.
commands.syntax:
az vmware addon srm delete [--ids]
                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                           [--private-cloud]
                           [--resource-group]
                           [--subscription]
                           [--yes]
examples: az vmware addon srm delete --resource-group MyResourceGroup --private-cloud MyPrivateCloud

commands.name: az vmware addon srm show
commands.summary: Show details of a Site Recovery Manager (SRM) addon.
examples: az vmware addon srm show --resource-group MyResourceGroup --private-cloud MyPrivateCloud

commands.name: az vmware addon srm update
commands.summary: Update a Site Recovery Manager (SRM) addon for a private cloud.
commands.syntax:
az vmware addon srm update [--add]
                           [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                           [--ids]
                           [--license-key]
                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                           [--private-cloud]
                           [--remove]
                           [--resource-group]
                           [--set]
                           [--subscription]
examples: az vmware addon srm update --resource-group MyResourceGroup --private-cloud MyPrivateCloud --license-key "41915-178A8-FF4A4-DB683-6D735"
